title: Google\Cloud\Compute\V1\LocalizedMessage
name: LocalizedMessage
description:
Provides a localized error message that is safe to return to the user which can be attached to an RPC error.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.compute.v1.LocalizedMessage

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.locale
params.description: The locale used following the specification defined at https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/bcp/bcp47.txt. Examples are: "en-US", "fr-CH", "es-MX"

params.name: data.message
params.description: The localized error message in the above locale.
